phrases: I have had this image in my head since I was a child.
An image of a landscape you could find anywhere.
A scene from a dream that I have all the time.
But I have never been there.
I have been told it is because I have undergone In-Grove's Anti-Feminus.
But it did not really matter why.
I just wanted to search for something.
That is why I went on this trip.
There are not any cleaners this far out...
Make a short jump as soon as the ship is stable!
There is a life-sign in the crash zone?
This naked girl was holding Kai-kun while they were surrounded by light.
Yeah, she looked exactly like that girl sitting over...
Could you explain exactly what is going on?
Just let me say this: Do not get the wrong idea.
What you are thinking right now.
She transferred into the third year class at our school today.
I am Kai-kun's older sister, Nanami.
Thank you for having me in your home.
Why is she at your house, Kai-kun, when you have only just met today?
Th-There was a malfunction in the quan linkage,
and my altalite was seriously damaged,
so I could not go anywhere,
and the damage to the incrobe was extensive...
That is all too hard for Onee-chan to understand...
Basically, she has nowhere to live due to some problems,
and it seems she has no money, either.
I just happened to run into her on the way home from school,
and she told me the story.
So I told her she could stay here for a night...
I mean, you could not just walk away after hearing that.
You cannot have a girl camping out somewhere by herself.
Why were you two embracing by the front door?
I-I mean, he was not feeling well, so I was just taking care of him!
I started to feel sick and lost consciousness...
I am not sure, but I am fine now.
That is what you were doing?
Holding him close to you so he gets better...
That is taking care of him, all right.
Did you think he would get better if you embraced him?
That is what we do on my planet!
I-I mean, where I come from.
Wow, so you came from so far away to study abroad by yourself!
Your Japanese is really good, too!
Well, I understand what is going on now.
why not contact your parents back home?
I think I know how you feel!
I am sorry we brought up such sad memories.
Kai-kun and I lost our parents, too,
I really know how you feel!
A-Anyway, so that is what is going on.
So there should not be a problem with letting her stay here a night, right?
How about just letting her live here?
I mean, I will be leaving for a pretty long business trip tomorrow.
Someone'll need to take care of Kai-kun.
Since she is a senpai from his school, I will not have to worry.
And since she is a girl, she will be able to cook and do the laundry.
Nanami-san, you are being too lax!
You cannot let a girl and guy live under the same roof like this!
People have to help each other out when they are on hard times.
so he would not try anything funny...
You thought about it for a second!
I am not at all worthy of such favor,
They sound like they are going to get married...
I am going to walk Tanigawa home.
You seem like you are mad.
You are just helping her out, right?
She was in a bad spot and you just helped her out, right?
That is all there was to it.
You do not have to walk me any farther.
So that pretty girl is going to stay at Kirishima-kun's house?
It just kind of kept building up to that.
But Kirishima-kun lives there with his sister.
His sister is leaving tomorrow on a long business trip.
I know where we are going tomorrow for our meeting.
She said she still had to do some packing.
She ate dinner already and is in her room.
Is this a cold noodle dish?
It was hot today, so I thought something cold would be good.
I just was not expecting the flavor, so I was surprised.
Yeah, this cold pasta will be fine.
Could I ask you a question?
Why did you come to study abroad here?
There is a place I wanted to visit.
I could take you there, if you would like.
Well, I do not know where it is...
There is a tree there, and a lake.
It does not really have anything special to identify it.
That would make it hard to find.
But I would still like to go there.
And I have to have a meeting with everyone tomorrow...
How am I going to explain this to them?
Oh, yeah, not too long ago, I...
Did you think he would get better if you embraced him?
I need to give you medical attention right away.
It does not look like I can repair it.
Rinon, how is the quan linkage looking?
It is bugging out pretty badly.
But I do not regret what is happened.
I was able to make it to this planet.
Maybe I was too tired from everything going on,
but as soon as I hit my bed, I fell right asleep.
I did not even have any dreams.
Onee-chan-san said she is going to leave soon.
I did not know it was so late...
Oh, I borrowed it from Onee-chan-san.
Sleepwear from this area is a little embarrassing.
If you do not say goodbye, I am going to cry!
Kaito-kun, make sure you do not get sick.
Try not to use too much out of your living expenses.
Make sure you study, get along with your friends,
and do not stay up too late.
I am getting sad, so goodbye and take care.
Ichika-chan, take care of Kai-kun for me...
There is a place I want to stop by before we head back.
A place you want to stop by?
Yeah, you need to get some everyday clothes.
That was a lot of fun.
Shopping really is a girl's greatest pleasure.
I have to tell Onee-chan-san thank you, too.
You can wait until she calls us.
I almost could not wait any longer.
We said yesterday we were going...
Sorry, but we all decided on your house as the place to do it.
Close enough to go shopping together already, huh?
How did you get in the house, anyway?
You should use a better lock.
Do not just unlock it without asking.
But I have to do my due diligence.
On where my good friend is staying.
Now that we are all here,
we can begin our first meeting regarding Director...
Do you have to call me that?
Actually, why is she in charge?
So what type of movie are we making?
We will be using this script I wrote for the film.
By the way, the idea was developed over twenty years.
In the 23rd century, mobile weapons are used across the world.
It will be a huge flick that is far beyond what Hollywood could pull off.
We will do it all in CG, so it will be okay.
We might not need a camera, then.
Should not we do something we know we can do?
How about a story related to school?
I am sure the school will let us film there, too.
Well, that is one way to play it safe.
What would we do for the story?
Zombies appear at the school out of nowhere,
and the main characters, the only people left alive
Do you have any requests, Ichika-senpai?
Kirishima-kun, you are quite the brave one.
You are the lead, so you should tell us what you would like to do.
It does not have anything to do with the story,
but I would like to see some pretty scenery.
I just got here, so I would like to go...
There is a place I wanted to visit.
Oh, s-sorry for being so abstract.
Let us go around to different places.
It is almost summer break anyway.
We can film the movie and have fun at the same time.
I think we would end up just messing around.
That would not be so bad.
It is not like we have to put together a movie no matter what.
Let us go all over the place.
You might find that place you want to go.
We will think about the content of the movie.
But let us all toast for the success of the film.
But it has a bit of sweetness that is kind of good.
Yes, I brought a lot with me, so have as much as you would like.
And I am out this round!
What are you guys doing out there by yourselves?!
You think I am disturbing you two, do not you?
You are going to be staying here, right?
You guys are going to live together.
You two will be alone together all day...
I will get straight to the point!
How do you feel about Kaito-kun?
Well, Kaito-kun helped me when I was in a time of need...
I am asking what you think of him!
Is there even an animal like that?
But it is kind of cute.
Now that things are really getting started,
we will play my special version of the King game.
You will understand when we play.
number three, flick number one in the forehead, as hard as you can.
Why is this all happening to me?
What the hell is with this drawing?
Number three, take off your pants.
Why are you taking off your boxers, too?!
Number four, make a pose like a female panther.
This movie is shaping up very well.
I wonder what that drink was.
My head hurts all of a sudden...
Close your eyes for a second.
We have to go visit him!
That was the one thing you should not have said.
